description:
The Gatlantean Fleet is pushing toward Earth, and it’s up to the Andromeda to lead the defense. Meanwhile, the Yamato has a way to upgrade its Wave Motion Gun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle off the Shores of Saturn: Gathering of the Wave Motion Fleet!
Dousei Oki Kaisen: Hadouhou Kantai Shuuketsu Seyo!
土星沖海戦・波動砲艦隊集結せよ!
